00067     typedef enum tNetPacketIdentifier{
00077       NPI_GEN_IDENT     = 0x0000,
00078 
00088       NPI_SVR_CONRESP   = 0x4000,
00089 
00096       NPI_INVALID       =0xFFFF
00097     };
00098 
00102     typedef union npPacketBaseData{
00104       struct {
00112         guint16 packetIdentifier;
00113       };
00115       enet_uint8 data[2];
00116     };
00117 
00148     class NetPacketBase{
00149     public:
00150       NetPacketBase();
00151       NetPacketBase(tNetPacketIdentifier);
00152       ~NetPacketBase();
00153 
00160       virtual void netSerialize(){};
00161 
00168       virtual void netDeserialize(){};
00169 
00175       virtual enet_uint8* getData(){};
00176 
00177       virtual void setData(enet_uint8*, size_t);
00183       virtual size_t getDataLength(){};
00184 
00185       void send();
00186       tNetPacketIdentifier getIdentifier();
00187 
00188       const char* typeToString(tNetPacketIdentifier);
00189 
00190     protected:
00191 
00192       int convert(int);
00193 
00199       tNetPacketIdentifier id;
00200 
00201     private:
00202 
00208       bool isReliable;

00211       npPacketBaseData* data;
00212     };
